name: FoodRun (Mr_Najm_Nabhani)
description:
With too many delicious food in this word it's hard to figure out what's good & what's bad for health.  Guide this man towards losing his weight , reduce his fats and increase his health by keeping him running and eating what's healthy.

-How To Win?  Let the health bar (Green) reach full, and the fats bar (Red) reach zero.

- Controls:   drag & drop food.

-Credits:

Assets taken from 'VectorPixelStar':  https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/food
